pages.text:
Drifters RV Park in Pensacola, Florida
.page-header
Call Us: 850-484-2488
Drifters RV Park
Pet Friendly RV Park in Pensacola, FL
Full Hookups (30/50 AMPs) at all sites
Check Availability
Our Park Information
New Owner as of September 2020.
Drifters is a Veteran owned, family run RV park in Pensacola, Florida.
We offer:
21 large, level back-in sites.  18 feet wide, 75 feet back-in length.
Full Hookups and 30/50 AMP at all sites.
Free highspeed WiFi Internet.
Picnic tables at all sites
Clean restrooms, Shower and Laundry facilities
Well Behaved Pets Welcome
Good Sam, Military and First Responder Discounts for Daily and Weekly rates
Right around the corner from Carpenters Campers, Home Depot, Wal-Mart and several fine grocery stores.
Discover Florida’s most beautiful beaches and enjoy everything the gulf coast has to offer while staying in Pensacola’s friendliest and quiet RV park.  Drifters is pet friendly and all sites have full hookups, and Wireless Internet access.
Known as the city of Five Flags, Pensacola has been ruled by the countries of Spain, France, England, the United States and the Confederate States of America.  Its History dates back 450 years when the first Spanish explorers landed on Pensacola Beach.
Daily
–  $52.62 /Day  includes Tax, Full Hookups, WiFi, and Electricity based on double occupancy.  $7.00/day for each additional adult. (kids under 18 are free)
Weekly
–  $319 /Week includes Tax, Full Hookups, WiFi, and Electric
based on double occupancy
.  $7.00/day
for each additional adult. (kids under 18 are free)
•
Anyone staying over 5 days must be fully self contained.
Monthly Rate Sites available – Call for Availability
*Don’t forget about our 10% Good Sam, Military, Law Enforcement and First Responder Discounts that apply to the Daily and Weekly rates.
* Check-in time: 1:00 PM
(NO ARRIVALS AFTER DARK PLEASE!)
Check-out time: 11:00 AM
* Extended stays depend on site availability. RV’s subject to inspection
* Enclosures on site are by Owner approval only.
* No commercial vehicles, must be parked off site of the park.
* We accept: Cash, and major Credit Cards
* Cancellations: Cancellations for daily and/or weekly campers must be received at least 1 week prior to arrival date.
Any cancellations received within 72 hours will not be refunded.
* Once checked in if you plan to leave early, three days notice is required to get any refund. Deposits require one weeks notice or no deposit will be given.
* No Shows: Failure to show or notify us in compliance with our cancellation policy will be charged the full daily rate.
* No tent camping.
Online Booking:
Check Availability
Call:
850-484-2488
Email:
info@driftersrvpark.com
Visit the
Bay area Convention and Visitors Web Site
for more Pensacola History and things to do while visiting our great city.
Located in the Heart of Pensacola, Florida.
Close to area attractions. Enjoy the most beautiful beaches in the world, historic tours, Blue Angels air shows and fine dining.
The Worlds Most Beautiful Beaches
Championship Golf
Fantastic Shopping
Great Restaurants
Seville Square And Historic District
T.T. Wentworth Jr. State Museum
Pensacola Museum of Art
Naval Air Station, Pensacola
Naval Aviation Museum and Imax Theatre
Fort Barrancas
Close to Wal-Mart, Home Depot, Lowes and
Carpenters Campers
FULL-TIME Rv-ers
Pensacola is one of the top locations for full-time RV-ers.  Here is the list of telephone numbers for RV-ers interested in making Pensacola their Home Base:
American Home Base.
Mail Forwarding and Other Services.  Phone: 800-422-4663
Florida Department of Highway Safety and Motor Vehicles.
for Vehicle Registration and Drivers License. Phone: 850-438-6500
Escambia County Voter Registration
Phone: 850-595-3900
Directions:
There are two easy ways to get to the Drifters RV Park.
9110 Untreiner Avenue, Pensacola, FL 32534
From Interstate 10 traveling West take exit 10B towards Cantonment. Take the Nine Mile Rd. Exit.
Traveling East Take I-10 Exit 5 (W. Nine Mile Road), continue East for 3.2 miles and turn right on Untreiner Ave. (Right after Home Depot).  Drifters will be .1 Mile on left.
Office Hours
Monday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday  9:30a – 3:00p
Saturday  11:00a – 3:00p
Closed on Tuesday and Sunday
Check Availability
Testimonials
"Stayed here for a week. Close to everything, full hookups, good neighbors. Other reviews complain about the cats, there are a couple that roam. Long term feeds them, getting fixed. Staff helpful, owner easy to get along with. Would stay again if in the area. Don't know anything about laundry or restroom, we have our own."
David G
Google Reviews
